attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0872502162. Warranty valid until March 2023 or 100 000 km's, whichever comes first. 
Service plan valid until March 2023 or 100 000 km's, whichever comes first. 
Purchase this 2020 Fiat 500 900T Twinair Sport Cabriolet now! It is sporty and nippy with a classic compact design that is still relevant to this day. You can get around town quickly and efficiently with this sporty hatchback. It provides the right amount of power for this compact hatchback. It produces 77 kW of power and 145 Nm of torque. It provides excellent fuel consumption as the manufacturers' claimed fuel consumption figures averages at 4.2 litres per 100 km. This is exceptional! You get the perfect balance of sportiness and elegance and it still offers fuel savviness.    


ALL PRE-OWNED VEHICLES UNDERGO A STRINGENT AA MULTI-POINT CHECK AND AA ROADWORTHY BEFORE DELIVERY. WE DELIVER COUNTRYWIDE AND IT GETS EVEN BETTER, WE COME TO YOU. FINANCE AVAILABLE AND A TEST DRIVE IS A MUST. PRICE EXCLUDES LICENSE REGISTRATION, ADMINISTRATION, DELIVERY, AND ON THE ROAD FEES.

*ERRORS AND OMISSIONS EXCEPTED

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877277079. TAKE A DRIVE ON THE WILD SIDE!!! The Ford Ranger has always been near to the top of the pick-up class in terms of safety The electric power steering is particularly good for a pick-up in terms of its weight and responsiveness. Safety features include driver and front passenger, front, and seat-side airbags, dynamic stability control, emergency brake assist, hill descent control, hill launch assist, to mention a few.
We provide RWC upon delivery and we do a multi-point check on our vehicles for your peace of mind. The price excludes dealer fees and smash and grab protection film. Call us today to arrange a test drive. Errors and omissions Reserved. T&Cs apply

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877215604. Balance of 3 YEAR 100 000 KM WARRANTY + 2 YEAR 50 000 POWER TRAIN WARRANTY
OPTIONAL SERVICE PLAN
It all comes together in the KUV100 NXT to redefine urban mobility once again. This is no meek and mild wannabe - with its bold SUV stance, sporty styling and imposing good looks - it's the ultimate urban warrior. This vehicle has ample room for five adults to travel in comfort, height adjustable driver’s seat, durable high quality fabric upholstery, front and rear armrests with integrated cup holders.  Not only is the Mahindra KUV100 stylish, the peppy mFalcon engine will let you push your limits. Even more refined, it is quiet and offers an enhanced driving experience with minimum in-cabin noise.  
Built for fuel efficiency ...
Book your test drive now...
